question: Three Talaaqs in one sentence will constitute three Talaaqs and not only one.
answer:
QUESTION

on a divorce paper it says talaq 3 times in one sentence will it be count as 1divorce or 3. thank you

ANSWER


Share:

Three Talaaqs in one sentence will constitute three Talaaqs and not only one.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
